title: 60A.26 SUSPENSION OF INSURERS; NOTIFICATIONS AND REPORTS.
text:
The commissioner of commerce shall notify the insurance departments of all other states whenever, under any law then in effect, the commissioner suspends the right of a foreign or domestic insurer to transact business in this state.
The commissioner of commerce shall report public regulatory actions, investigative information, and complaints to the appropriate reporting system or database of the National Association of Insurance Commissioners.
